Package gg.w6.chesslib.model.piece

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
gg.w6.chesslib.model.piece.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pawn, Rider
@Immutable public abstract class Piece extends Object
Represents a chess piece.

This is an abstract class that serves as a base for all pieces.

  • Method Details

    • getColor

      @NotNull public @NotNull Color getColor()
      Returns the color of the piece.
      Returns:
      The color of the piece (either WHITE or BLACK).

    • getLetter

      public char getLetter()
      Returns the character representation of the piece.

      For white pieces, it returns the uppercase letter. For black pieces, it returns the lowercase letter.

      Returns:
      The character representation of the piece.

    • valueOf

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Piece valueOf(char c)
      Returns the piece corresponding to the given character.
      Parameters:
      c - The character representation of the piece (either uppercase for white or lowercase for black).
      Returns:
      The corresponding Piece object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the character does not represent a valid piece.
